statements.statement: SELECT user_id AS USERID, '' as MAILID, user_name AS USERNAME, user_dept AS DEPTID, user_dept_name AS DEPTNAME, user_dept_rank AS DUTYNAME, 1 as SEQ, now() AS "UPDATE", '1' AS USEFLAG FROM user_ssbr WHERE user_dept_rank LIKE '%팀장%'
INSERT INTO post_user(user_id, mail_id, name, dept_id, dept_name, duty_name, seq, updt_dt, use_flag) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now(), 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updt_dt = now() ,comnl_reg_flag=0
DELETE FROM post_user WHERE comnl_reg_flag=0 and ( now() - updt_dt ) > 604800
